revision.text:
{{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Biography |living=no |class=start |auto=inherit |listas=Sun, Dianying }} {{WikiProject China|class=start|importance=mid}} {{WikiProject Military history|class=Start |B1=n |B2=y |B3=y |B4=y |B5=n |Biography=yes |Chinese=y }} }}
==Untitled== The the translation problem comes from these two paragraphs from: http://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%AD%AB%E6%AE%BF%E8%8B%B1
1933年，馮玉祥在察哈爾省主張抗日反蔣，國民政府中央為怕孫殿英與其合作，而孫殿英亦不願捲入爭端，希望至西北發展，因此政府派其軍隊至青海屯墾，亦意圖藉西北馬家軍的力量來對付孫殿英。
1934年1月，孫部六萬軍隊，自綏遠省西部欲進入寧夏，在寧夏省主席馬鴻逵、其弟馬鴻賓以及青海來支援的馬步方等人的軍隊作戰，是為三馬拒孫之役，雙方作戰三個月，孫殿英戰敗，軍隊回退時不意又受到綏遠的晉綏軍攻擊而繳械。自此孫殿英隱退山西晉祠及太原
Another account of the incident:
http://big5.xinhuanet.com/gate/big5/www.gs.xinhuanet.com/dfpd/2004-06/20/content_2347069.htm
民國二十二年（1933）蔣介石任命孫殿英為青海屯墾督辦，並指示軍事委員會北平分會主任何應欽助孫赴任。但甘肅綏靖主任朱紹良又暗示馬鴻賓、馬鴻逵幫助馬步芳合兵拒孫，以保西北地盤。翌年孫部途經寧夏，“三馬”為保地盤，孫殿英也無退路，雙方竭力拼殺三月之久，孫殿英敗走太原。
"1933 Chiang Kai-Shek appoints Sun Tienying to station troops to open up wasteland the supervisor for Qinghai, and instruction military committee Peking branch Director He Yingqin helps the Sun to proceed to new official post. But Gansu pacification Director Zhu Shaoliang also to suggest Ma Hungpin, Ma Hungk'uei helps the Ma bu fragrantly to gather the soldier to resist Sun, guarantees northwest domain. Next year grandson department way Ningxia, "three horses" for will guarantee the domain, Sun Tienying also do not have the escape route, both sides fight with all might by might and main long time of the March, Sun Tienying suffer defeat and flee Taiyuan."
== Source interpretation ==
It seems that Sun was set up by Chiang to be isolated in Quighai and defeated by the Ma family forces. Can anyone confirm this or have a more accurate narrative?[[User:Asiaticus|Asiaticus]] 01:31, 21 August 2006 (UTC)
